akas: Monsters and Mysteries in America (original title)
akas from release info: Monsters and Mysteries in America (original title)

1.title: Men in Black

episode of.title: Monsters and Mysteries in America (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Ever since UFO sightings began, reports of mysterious dark suited men have followed. These Men-in-Black have been spotted around the world, threatening witnesses and destroying evidence. Are they government agents, extraterrestrial or something demonic?

2.title: Tennessee Wildman - Subterranean Reptoids

episode of.title: Monsters and Mysteries in America (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Across America, unidentified creatures have terrorized entire towns. With an appetite for residents, cold-blooded, sewer-dwelling reptoids are said to lurk beneath Los Angeles-and in the forests of Tennessee hunters encounter the legendary Wildman.

3.title: Sabine Thing - Lightening Psychics

episode of.title: Monsters and Mysteries in America (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: A day by the water turns into a nightmare as a group is terrorized by fearsome creatures lurking along the Sabine River. Lightning strikes can be fatal, but two survivors develop astonishing psychic powers that they've used to help solve crimes.

4.title: Florida Zombie - Dybuk Box - Shenango Dog Boy

episode of.title: Monsters and Mysteries in America (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: A terrible unseen force turns normal men into zombies who get a craving for human flesh. Tragedy befalls anyone who encounters a cursed Dybbuk Box, while young girls are being hunted by the Shenango Dog Boy.

5.title: Vermont Pigman, Bridge Where I Died, Project Stargate

episode of.title: Monsters and Mysteries in America (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: In a small Vermont town, the legendary Pigman unleashes a beastly wrath upon trespassing teenagers; an alluring hitchhiker has monstrous plans for anyone who gives her a ride; and the classified details of a secret government program using psychic spies.

6.title: Mill Race Monster, Toxic Rain, Devil Dogs

episode of.title: Monsters and Mysteries in America (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: In Columbus, Indiana a swampy beast's terrifying attacks lead to the largest monster hunt in U.S. history. Bizarre gel-like rain sickens residents in one town; could the military be to blame? And hungry Devil Dogs guard a cursed Wisconsin island.

7.title: Carolina Reptile Man, Succubus, Napa Rebobs

episode of.title: Monsters and Mysteries in America (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: A cold-blooded reptilian beast preys upon unsuspecting campers along the South Carolina coast. A seductive succubus with a taste for terror targets a young rock musician. A mad scientist's monstrous flying monkeys unleash their wrath upon Napa Valley.

8.title: Mantis Man, Spottsville Monster

episode of.title: Monsters and Mysteries in America (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: An entire family takes up arms in a rooftop showdown with the Spottsville Monster, a vicious beast with a taste for flesh. Eerie Phantoms protect survivors of one of America's most deadly tornadoes and New Jersey fishermen face off with a gigantic bug.

9.title: Demon Panthers, Helicopter Crew Meets UFO, Doppelganger

episode of.title: Monsters and Mysteries in America (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Across Southern Illinois, townsfolk arm themselves against a demonic feline predator. A teenage girl tangles with a terrifying doppelganger that attempts to take her place. Two police chopper pilots in air combat with a UFO trying to shoot them down.

10.title: The John Keel Files

episode of.title: Monsters and Mysteries in America (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: In the late 1960's the town of Point Pleasant, West Virginia is besieged by a series of monstrous creatures, blood-seeking UFO's, and mysterious men in black. Two reporters seek answers, culminating in one of the deadliest disasters in U.S. history.

1.title: Appalachia

episode of.title: Monsters and Mysteries in America (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: The dark hallows and dense forests of Appalachia harbor strange mysteries. Local residents will recount their encounters with the terrifying Sheepsquatch, the dark winged-creature, Mothman, and aliens from space.

2.title: Pacific Northwest

episode of.title: Monsters and Mysteries in America (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: From the untamed forests of the Pacific Northwest new evidence that the elusive hairy beast called Sasquatch... IS REAL. This densely forested region also boasts tales of wolf spirits in Oregon and lake monsters in Montana.

3.title: Ozarks

episode of.title: Monsters and Mysteries in America (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: The dark and mysterious forests of the Ozarks have always been a source of folklore and unexplainable tales. Locals recount their encounters with "The Fouke Monster", "The Pope Lick Monster", and the "Spooklight".

4.title: Badlands

episode of.title: Monsters and Mysteries in America (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Out of the Badlands, a wasteland so desolate that nothing is known to take root, come three terrifying stories: the 'Devil's Highway', menacing Black Eyed Kids, and the Curse of Superstition Mountain.

5.title: Swamp

episode of.title: Monsters and Mysteries in America (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: The swampy jungle of the Louisiana Bayou is long rumored to be area where evil lurks and monsters prowl. From this region come tales of legendary beasts - the Honey Island Swamp Monster, the shape-shifting Rougarou and blood-sucking Vampires.

6.title: Desert

episode of.title: Monsters and Mysteries in America (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: When desert ranchers suffer unexplained terror, the suspects appear to be Thunderbirds & Skinwalkers. A family comes under attack by the Nightstalker, and a couple reveals their horrifying encounter with extraterrestrials-Alien Abductions.

1.title: Texas Terror

episode of.title: Monsters and Mysteries in America (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: The Lone Star state harbors pockets of land where history, mystery, and terror prevail. Local residents will recount their encounters with the terrifying Lake Worth Monster, the legendary Chupacabra, and Zombie Soldiers.

2.title: New England

episode of.title: Monsters and Mysteries in America (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: The Bridgewater Triangle is an area shrouded with inexplicable phenomena and UFO sightings. It is home to legendary stories of Alien Abductions, the mysterious Dover Demon, and the Native American troll-like creature called Pukwudgie.

3.title: Prarie Land

episode of.title: Monsters and Mysteries in America (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: A vicious hairy beast, a giant winged creature, and shadow monsters terrify their witnesses - even plunging entire towns into panic and fear. Midwestern residents recount stories of MOMO, The Van Meter Visitor, and Shadow People.

4.title: Wendigo, Dogman, Wolfman

episode of.title: Monsters and Mysteries in America (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Detailed accounts of Wendigo, Dogman, Wolfman. Creature encounters from Michigan, Minnesota, and also Canada are explored.

5.title: California Monster Country

episode of.title: Monsters and Mysteries in America (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Much of inland California is remote wilderness. Within the Sierra Mountains, come legends of the Bigfoot Wars... and a terrifying Evil Gnome that stalks an innocent family. Further south, the legendary HellHound wreaks havoc in a desert neighborhood.

6.title: Southeast Gulf

episode of.title: Monsters and Mysteries in America (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Florida's Skunk Ape stalks and attacks a hunter in the swamp, evidence of the Lizard Man of Scape Ore Swamp is revealed, and a teenage boy in South Carolina survives an extraordinary alien abudction and lives to tell his story.

7.title: Black Swamp

episode of.title: Monsters and Mysteries in America (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: A family's day hike turns to nightmare when the children run off on their own, only to encounter the monstrous Grassman. The Ohio River and the Big Muddy River in Illinois also harbor beasts: Green Clawed Beast & Big Muddy Monster.

8.title: Flying Creatures

episode of.title: Monsters and Mysteries in America (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: No longer just the stuff of legend, flying monsters are raining down terror from above. These airborne attacks have sparked fear across communities. Witnesses tell of their harrowing encounters with a Flying Humanoid, Batsquatch, and the Jersey Devil.

9.title: Alien Abduction

episode of.title: Monsters and Mysteries in America (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Colorado authorities quickly hone in on a suspect after finding a name tag in a bloody sweatshirt near the scene of a young girl's murder - but are later stunned when DNA reveals they've got the wrong man.

10.title: Sykesville Monster, Lechuza, and The Rake

episode of.title: Monsters and Mysteries in America (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: A towering nocturnal monster and an owl witch relentlessly stalk the young and innocent. Sightings of a wild man beast plunged a town into panic and may even have launched a secret government search. --- The Rake, Lechuza, and Sykesville Monster.

11.title: Mutants

episode of.title: Monsters and Mysteries in America (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: Across America, grotesque, angry, vicious mutant monsters are out for revenge. Victims of unexplained terror at the hands of Melon Heads, Devil Monkey, and the Blue Albino Woman come forward to share their horrifying stories.

12.title: Cajun Werewolf

episode of.title: Monsters and Mysteries in America (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: Federal investigations involving a mysterious bigfoot from outer space; An aquatic mega monster viciously emerging from the depths; And a shape shifting werewolf summoned to protect the swamps. UFO Bigfoot, Lake Pepin Monster, Cajun Werewolf.

imdb.title: Monsters and Mysteries in America
plot: Documents the sightings of monsters and brings in the witnesses as well.
